name: AmcrestCloud
0:
”Alexa, discover my devices”
”Alexa, show my front door camera”
”Alexa, show my pet camera”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
*********************************
ALEXA SUPPORT IS ONLY OFFERED THROUGH OUR PREMIUM CLOUD SERVICE, AMCREST CLOUD. YOU CAN LEARN MORE ABOUT THE APPS THAT CAN BE USED FOR MANAGING YOUR AMCREST CAMERAS AT https://amcrest.com/cloud-view/
*********************************
 
Amcrest Cloud skill for Amazon Alexa allows users to play live video from their Amcrest security cameras right to their Echo Show, Echo Spot, Fire TV, Fire TV Stick or Fire Tablets (Gen 7 and above) (excluding Fire HD 10). Foscam cameras are not supported.
 
You must be registered with Amcrest Cloud in order to use the Amcrest Cloud skill with Alexa. You can sign up for an Amcrest Cloud account by visiting https://amcrest.com/cloud and selecting a plan.
 
To make Alexa aware of your cameras, you must first create an Amcrest Cloud account and add your camera.
 
Then, in the Alexa app, search for the Amcrest Cloud skill and select the “Enable Skill” button to link your Amcrest Cloud account with your Alexa account. Once that is done, simply ask Alexa to discover your devices.
 
“Alexa, discover my devices”
 
For more information on the setup process, please see the link below:
 
https://support.amcrest.com/hc/en-us/articles/360059434811-How-To-Setup-Alex-Echo-Show
 
You can then ask Alexa to play video from any of your cloud connected Amcrest cameras, simply by using the camera's name as it was setup in Amcrest Cloud.
 
For help with your Amcrest Camera or with your Amcrest cloud account please contact Amcrest directly at cloudsupport@amcrest.com.
 
Note: For Amcrest Smart Home devices please use the Amcrest Smart Home skill instead.
